mean_en: to change (secret messages, documents, etc.) from a set of letters, numbers, symbols, etc., you cannot understand into words you can understand
sentence: Sherlock Holmes managed to decode the 'Dancing Men' cipher by replacing each man by a letter.
sentence_trans: 夏洛克 福尔摩斯用字母代替小人的方法，成功破译“舞蹈的小人”的密码。
word_etyma: de去掉+code密码→去掉密码 → 破译
